title: Happy Birthday, You-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Happy birthday!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ooh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Happy birthday to You that is always joYous like the sun---!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ehehehe~, thank you thank you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Here, it’s a present from Nijigaku. A tower of sweets made from Yougashi and Youkan for You<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahahaha, you’re going at me with all these puns!? I’m so happy. Thank you--!! Can I eat it right away?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Of co~urse!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Alright, then. Aah~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>It’s a thank you for you who worked so hard, Ai-chan! Let’s eat together~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
